Test the (hover) media features. See Bug 136119 for details.

------------- with 'on-demand' hover -------------
Query "(hover)": true
Query "(Hover)": true
Query "(hover:none)": false
Query "(hover:NoNe)": false
Query "(hover:on-demand)": true
Query "(hover:oN-dEmAnd)": true
Query "(hover:bogusvalue)": false
Query "(hover:hover)": false
Query "(hover:HoveR)": false
Query "(any-hover)": true
Query "(any-Hover)": true
Query "(any-hover:none)": false
Query "(any-hover:NoNe)": false
Query "(any-hover:on-demand)": true
Query "(any-hover:oN-dEmAnd)": true
Query "(any-hover:bogusvalue)": false
Query "(any-hover:hover)": false
Query "(any-hover:HoveR)": false

Query "(any-hover:HoveR)": true
------------- with 'on-demand' and 'hover' hover, 'hover' is primary -------------
Query "(hover)": true
Query "(Hover)": true
Query "(hover:none)": false
Query "(hover:NoNe)": false
Query "(hover:on-demand)": false
Query "(hover:oN-dEmAnd)": false

Query "(any-hover:bogusvalue)": false
Query "(any-hover:hover)": true
Query "(any-hover:HoveR)": true
------------- with 'on-demand' and 'hover' hover, 'on-demand' is primary -------------

------------- with 'none', 'on-demand' and 'hover' hover, 'none' is primary -------------
